section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.text1: 1.1. This document is an offer by Private Entrepreneur Basev Maksim Igorevich, hereinafter referred to as the "Service Provider," to conclude a service agreement under the conditions specified below.
section1.text2: 1.2. This agreement is a public offer in accordance with the Civil Code of the Kyrgyz Republic. Acceptance of this offer means the conclusion of an agreement on the terms set out herein.

section2.title: 2. Subject of the Agreement
section2.text1: 2.1. The Service Provider undertakes to provide services in software development, and the Client undertakes to accept these services and pay for them in accordance with the terms of this agreement.

section3.title: 3. Procedure for Concluding the Agreement
section3.text1: 3.1. The agreement is considered concluded from the moment the Client accepts the terms of this offer by paying for the services of the Service Provider.

section4.title: 4. Rights and Obligations of the Parties
section4.text1: 4.1. The Service Provider undertakes to: Provide the services in a timely manner and with proper quality.
section4.text2: 4.2. The Client undertakes to: Pay for the services of the Service Provider in full and within the established time frames.

section5.title: 5. Cost and Payment Procedure
section5.text1: 5.1. The cost of services is determined based on a price list.
section5.text2: 5.2. Payment is made to the following bank account of the Service Provider:

section6.title: 6. Liability of the Parties
section6.text1: 6.1. For failure to perform or improper performance of their obligations, the parties shall be liable in accordance with the legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic.

section7.title: 7. Final Provisions
section7.text1: 7.1. This agreement is valid from the moment of its conclusion until the full fulfillment of the obligations by both parties.
section7.text2: 7.2. Any disputes and disagreements shall be resolved through negotiations. If no agreement can be reached, the disputes shall be resolved in court at the location of the Service Provider.
